sentences.en: Girls imitated me. Now I'm trying to imitate a city girl.
sentences.cn: 姑娘们过去个个都模仿我, 可现在呢,我自个儿反而要去模仿城里的姑娘们.

sentences.en: He could imitate in speech or writing most of those he admired.
sentences.cn: 他能模仿大多数自己崇拜的偶像的讲话和写作风格。

sentences.en: I tried to imitate natural lighting in these early studies.
sentences.cn: 在这些早期的研究中,我曾设法模拟自然的光线.

sentences.en: I'd make fun of her dress and imitate her speech.
sentences.cn: 我会拿她的衣着开玩笑，并模仿她说话。

sentences.en: Instinctively, she felt a desire to imitate it.
sentences.cn: 本能地, 她就想模仿那种姿态.

sentences.en: It can simulate, or imitate different measurements by electronic means.
sentences.cn: 它能够利用电子手段来模拟或者仿真不同的测量值.

sentences.en: Overcome with admiration, he could not but imitate them.
sentences.cn: 他企羡之余, 不免模仿.

sentences.en: She was a splendid mimic and loved to imitate Winston Churchill.
sentences.cn: 她是个出色的模仿者，喜欢模仿温斯顿·丘吉尔。

sentences.en: Some birds, as the parrot, can imitate human voice.
sentences.cn: 有些鸟儿, 如鹦鹉, 能模仿人的声音.

sentences.en: Some parrots can imitate sounds and repeat words and sentences.
sentences.cn: 有些鹦鹉能模仿(人的)声音,还能学人说一些单词和句子.

sentences.en: The Japanese have no wish to imitate Western social customs and attitudes.
sentences.cn: 日本人无意仿效西方的社会习俗和处事态度。

sentences.en: There was every reason to suppose that Henry would imitate them.
sentences.cn: 我们有一切理由可以相信亨利是会效法他们的.

sentences.en: This parrot has the power to imitate human words.
sentences.cn: 这只鹦鹉有模仿人类语言的能力。

sentences.en: Women do not necessarily have to imitate men to be successful in business.
sentences.cn: 女性不见得非要模仿男性才能在商界叱咤风云。

sentences.en: Wood is often painted to imitate stone.
sentences.cn: 木头常涂上油漆冒充石头.

sentences.en: You should imitate her way of doing things.
sentences.cn: 你应该效法她做事的方式.

trans.tran_en: to copy the way someone behaves, speaks, moves etc, especially in order to make people laugh
to copy the way someone behaves, speaks, moves etc, especially in order to make people laugh
